mapper.select: SELECT id, organization_id, username, password, nickname, last_login_time, is_enabled, create_time, update_time, updated_by, avatar FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username}

SELECT su.id, su.username, su.name, org.name organization_name, su.is_enabled enabled, su.create_time, su.last_login_time FROM sys_user su JOIN organization org ON su.organization_id = org.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND su.organization_id = #{paramDTO.organizationId}
AND org.name like #{organizationNameLike}
AND (su.name like #{nameLike} OR su.username like #{nameLike})
AND su.is_enabled = 1
AND su.is_enabled = 0
ORDER BY su.id
